meanings.sent1: Her hard work on the project was commendable.
meanings.sent2: The student's dedication to his studies is commendable.
meanings.sent3: It was commendable how the puppy tried to climb the stairs.
meanings.sent4: The way she handled the difficult situation was commendable, like a hero.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter's bravery in rescuing the family was truly commendable.
